name: Alone Red
description:
You find yourself in an unknown place, in the role of a red cube and your goal is to get out of the maze.
You will be waiting for a lot of obstacles, puzzles and difficulties.
In some situations, you will come to the aid of a blue cube that just like you, wants to get out of the maze.
You will need to have patience and nerves to go through all the rooms and find out the truth about..(DATA DELETED) :)
